h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Red Tides Location
content: With the Transformation, you can equip it and switch to it at any point from the Shrine. Simply choose 'Reignite The Sparks' and 'Set Spells'.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Red_Tides.md', within the main section titled 'Red Tides', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Red Tides Location'.
The content is as follows:
With the Transformation, you can equip it and switch to it at any point from the Shrine. Simply choose 'Reignite The Sparks' and 'Set Spells'.
